Class RestResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipd.dei.webapp.rest.RestResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryRestResource, CommentRestResource, CompanyRestResource, HintRestResource, ProbCatRestResource, ProbCompRestResource, ProblemRestResource, SubmissionRestResource, ThreadRestResource, UserRestResource, VoteRestResource

extends Object
    Represents a generic REST resource.
